name: Aeromancy
description:
Help the Aeromancer jump and fly across the woods!

Jump over platforms and clouds, as you make your way across the dark and foreboding woods. Try to collect as many orbs as you can!

Collect the diamonds to give you the ability to fly! 

This Game Includes:

  • Everything is beautifully hand-drawn and animated.
  • A relaxing piano soundtrack
  • A hand-drawn animated cut scene at the end of the game
  • Beautiful illustrations for the Main Menu and Ending Card

Credits:

All the music in this game was composed by ibi, check out his stuff!

Youtube, Spotify, Soundcloud, Instagram
